name: I want to get away
description:
A 2D dialogue based puzzle game where you move around using the WASD keys or your arrow keys. You click on things you want to interact with. 

Can be played in browser. Can also be downloaded for best experience.

Game made in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam NL 2022.

==============================================

None of the used assets are mine!

Environment assets from Cainos

Characters from Craftpix.net

Icons from Arisan

Dialogue system from Fungus
